general.title: General settings
general.description: This panel defines some settings that apply to all arm modes.

armed_away.description: Armed away will be used when all people left the house. All doors and windows allowing access to the house will be guarded, as well as motion sensors inside the house.

armed_home.description: Armed home (also known as armed stay) will be used when setting the alarm while people are in the house. All doors and windows allowing access to the house will be guarded, but not motion sensors inside the house.

armed_night.description: Armed night will be used when setting the alarm before going to sleep. All doors and windows allowing access to the house will be guarded, and selected motion sensors (downstairs) in the house.

armed_custom.description: An extra mode for defining your own security perimeter.

trigger_time.heading: Trigger time
trigger_time.description: Time during which the siren will sound

leave_time.heading: Leave time
leave_time.description: After trigger time has expired, disarm the alarm instead of returning to armed state.

entry_time.heading: Entry time
entry_time.description: After trigger time has expired, disarm the alarm instead of returning to armed state.

disarm_after_trigger.heading: Disarm after trigger
disarm_after_trigger.description: After trigger time has expired, disarm the alarm instead of returning to armed state.

sensors.title: Sensors
sensors.description: Currently configured sensors. Click on an entity to make changes.
sensors.no_items: There are no sensors added to the alarm yet. Make sure to add them first.
sensors.no_modes: Not assigned to any alarm mode yet

add_sensors.title: Add Sensors
add_sensors.description: Add more sensors. Make sure that your sensors have a friendly_name, so you can identify them.
add_sensors.no_items: There are no available HA entities that can be configured for the alarm. Make sure to include entities of the type binary_sensor.

always_on.heading: Always on
always_on.description: Sensor should always trigger the alarm.

modes.heading: Enabled modes
modes.description: Alarm modes in which this sensor is active.

allow_open.heading: Allow open
allow_open.description: Allow this sensor to remain active shortly after leaving.

enabled_modes.heading: Alarm modes in which this sensor is active

immediate.heading: This sensor should trigger the alarm immediately

code_arm_required.heading: Use arm code
code_arm_required.description: Require a code for arming the alarm

code_disarm_required.heading: Use disarm code
code_disarm_required.description: Require a code for disarming the alarm

code_format.heading: Code format
code_format.description: Sets the input type for Lovelace alarm card.

user_management.title: User management
user_management.description: Each user has its own code to arm/disarm the alarm.

new_user.title: Create new user
new_user.description: Users can be created for providing access to operating the alarm.

can_arm.heading: Allow user to arm the alarm
can_arm.description: Entering this code activates the alarm

can_disarm.heading: Allow user to disarm the alarm
can_disarm.description: Entering this code deactivates the alarm

old_code.heading: Current code
old_code.description: Current code, leave empty to leave unchanged.

event.heading: Event
event.description: When should the notification be sent

target.heading: Target
target.description: Device to send the push message to
